comments: He seems like a nice guy, but he\'s sooooo boring. He puts he to sleep sometimes. Overall, though, the class is good and generally easy. You have to be okay with working on your own.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: Pretty easy class, though some of the projects were challenging. He was rather boring though... didn\'t really help us or teach us anything. For the most part he let us do our own thing. Just put forth an effort and youll be fine.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: pretty easy class. gives you an assignment and a certain number of classes to finish it in, just show up, stick in your headphones and work. turn your stuff in on time and you\'re golden. he isn\'t super helpful, at least on his own, you have to specifically ask him for help otherwise he pretty much lets you be.

comments: The best professor that I\'ve ever had! He\'s Great! I\'d recommend him to anyone!
